name: Demio Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Demio Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Demio API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Demio API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: event

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Get (值: get) - Get an event report

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: status (值: None) - Filter results by participation status

eventId.name: eventId
eventId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
eventId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: company (值: None) - The value for the predefined Company field
ref_url (值: None) - Event Registration page URL. It can be useful when you do not know Event ID, but have Event link.
gdpr (值: None) - The value for the predefined GDPR field
last_name (值: None) - The value for the predefined Last Name field
phone_number (值: None) - The value for the predefined Phone Number field
date_id (值: None) - Event Session ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
website (值: None) - The value for the predefined Website field

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: The registrant's first name | (必填项)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The registrant's email address | (必填项)

dateId.name: dateId
dateId.description: ID of the session. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
dateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Session Name or ID | 作用: ID of the session. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)
